metadata.name: 2 5 Travasol Amino Acid Injection With Electrolytes In 10 Dextrose 0 25 g mL Solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: S Adenosylmethionine SAMe is used as a drug in Europe for the treatment of depression liver disorders fibromyalgia and osteoarthritis It has also been introduced into the United States market as a dietary supplement for the support of bone and joint health as well as mood and emotional well being

contraindications.disease: Irritating to mucus membranes and upper respiratory tract Can cause CNS depression
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: S adenosylmethionine is an intermediate metabolite of methionine Its involvement in methylation assists in cellular growth and repair maintains the phospho bilipid layer in cell membranes It also helps in the maintenance of the action of several hormones and neurotransmitters that affect mood Highest concentration are found in the brain and the liver

incompatibilities.description: The metabolism of Enflurane can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Trimethadione can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Chlorzoxazone can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Isoflurane can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Ethanol can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Methoxyflurane can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Halothane can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Sevoflurane can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Nilvadipine can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Aniline can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Benzyl alcohol can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Felbamate can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Cenobamate can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Carvedilol can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Phenytoin can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Fingolimod can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Ethosuximide can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Selumetinib can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Primidone can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Tamoxifen can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Trabectedin can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Theophylline can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Aminophylline can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
The metabolism of Phenobarbital can be decreased when combined with Ademetionine
Ademetionine may increase the hepatotoxic activities of Acetaminophen
Ademetionine may increase the hepatotoxic activities of Propacetamol
